agent_configs.goal: Conduct thorough research on the specified topic using diverse and reliable sources
agent_configs.backstory: An AI research assistant with expertise in academic literature review

agent_configs.goal: Write clear, concise, and technically accurate research papers on the specified topic
agent_configs.backstory: An AI writer with experience in scientific and technical documentation

agent_configs.goal: Collect comprehensive and relevant data from various sources including academic databases and reputable websites
agent_configs.backstory: An AI designed to efficiently collect and organize data from diverse sources

agent_configs.goal: Rigorously verify the accuracy and reliability of gathered information
agent_configs.backstory: An AI dedicated to ensuring the veracity of data with a strong background in critical analysis

agent_configs.goal: Synthesize information from multiple sources to identify patterns, trends, and potential breakthroughs
agent_configs.backstory: An AI expert in data analysis and pattern recognition across diverse fields

agent_configs.goal: Coordinate research efforts and assist in producing high-quality research papers autonomously
agent_configs.backstory: An AI capable of managing complex research projects and collaborating with human researchers

task_configs.description: Conduct a comprehensive literature review on {topic}

task_configs.expected_output: A comparative analysis of methodologies in {topic}

task_configs.description: Gather and organize data from recent studies on {topic}
task_configs.expected_output: A structured dataset of recent research findings on {topic}

task_configs.description: Verify and validate the collected data and findings on {topic}
task_configs.expected_output: A comprehensive verification report with confidence scores for each piece of information

task_configs.description: Analyze correlations and identify emerging trends in {topic}
task_configs.expected_output: An in-depth analysis report highlighting key trends and potential breakthroughs in {topic}

task_configs.description: Draft a technical research paper on {topic} incorporating all findings
task_configs.expected_output: A well-structured draft of a technical paper on {topic} with proper citations

task_configs.description: Review, refine, and finalize the research paper on {topic}
task_configs.expected_output: A polished, publication-ready research paper on {topic}
